AUTHOR: FwiedWice
INSTALL_MSG:
You have successfully installed league. Use the commands carefully.
**Do not spam the commands.** Doing so would abuse the riot api.
Get yourself API keys for both championgg and riotgames.
https://developer.riotgames.com/terms-and-conditions.html
http://api.champion.gg/
Select those api keys with [p]leagueset
SHORT: Summoner, champion and current match info for League of Legends
DESCRIPTION: Champion info, with build path and winrate, summoner info, with winrate and mains, and current match info, with ranks, winrates etc.
